mapper.select: select id, concat('[',area,'] ', name,' ',broadband,'mb/s') as name from t_server_tunnel where buy_status = 1

select `id`, `name`, `country`, `area`, `broadband`, `server_addr`, `create_time`, `price_type`, `sales_price`, `original_price`, `buy_status`, `status`, `server_end_time` from t_server_tunnel
and name like concat('%',#{params.name},'%')
order by id asc
